name: Lethal Tender
summary: Introducing an action-packed product that immerses you in the thrilling world of Bad Boy Nick Hunter. Join him on a high-stakes mission to protect the integrity of U.S. currency from the nefarious Thorne Devereaux. Your objective is to infiltrate Devereaux's base and eliminate waves of faceless guards to prevent their plan of coating the currency with a time-delayed explosive. Engage in intense combat scenarios as you take down enemies with precision and skill. Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
